name: Freedom March: Rebel Leader
description: Time has come. Start the revolution! Seems like the authorities forgot who they are. Your rebel soul can't take this anymore. Gather other people together and lead them to the freedom. Gain influence on your fellow-thinkers to successfully change the nation and win over the system!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
